title: Klein Tools H1802-30S Block and Tackle with Block 267, Anchor Hook 258, Spliced to Block 268
features: These are NOT occupational protective hooks. NOT for human support
Light, galvanized-steel shell blocks are fitted with snubbing hooks to hold the load
Sheaves are strong yet lightweight aluminum alloy with all-bronze bushings
All Klein block and tackle use high-quality, 3/8-Inch (1 cm) diameter rope
description: All Klein block and tackle use high-quality, 3/8-Inch (10 mm) diameter rope. Light, galvanized-steel shell blocks are fitted with snubbing hooks to hold the load. This package features two blocks with a swival Klein hook Cat. No. 259 with a maximum safe load of 750-Pound (340 kg). For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

Klein H1802-30S Block and Tackle, w/Guarded Snap Hooks w/Swivel Hook. The Klein H1802-30S Block and Tackle, w/Guarded Snap Hooks w/Swivel Hook are NOT occupational protective hooks and are NOT for human support. The Klein H1802-30S Block and Tackle, w/Guarded Snap Hooks w/Swivel Hook are light, galvanized-steel shell blocks that are fitted with snubbing hooks to hold the load. The Klein H1802-30S Block and Tackle, w/Guarded Snap Hooks w/Swivel Hook have sheaves that are strong yet lightweight aluminum alloy with all-bronze bushings. The Klein H1802-30S Block and Tackle, w/Guarded Snap Hooks w/Swivel Hook can come available with standard snap hooks or guarded snap hooks (with snap hook nose lengthened to extend over the latch or keeper) and a choice of forged hook Cat. No. 258 or swivel hook Cat. No. 259. The hooks fit under insulator and engage pin on cross-arm. All Klein block and tackle use high-quality, 3/8-Inch diameter rope. The Klein H1802-30S Block and Tackle, w/Guarded Snap Hooks w/Swivel Hook maximum safe load is 750-Pound. (338 kg).
